doc.field: American Federation of Television and Radio Artists (AFTRA), New York Local Office Records
American Federation of Television and Radio Artists (AFTRA), New York Local Office Records

This series contains correspondence, by-laws, handbooks, legal records, organizational constitutions, and financial statements documenting AFTRA's relationships and interactions with domestic and international unions, guilds, and federations representing a variety of entertainers and performers.
American Federation of Television and Radio Artists (AFTRA), New York Local Office Records
